005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ConstraintValidationFinding;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.JsonSchemaContentValidator.JsonValidationFinding;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.XmlSchemaContentValidator.XmlValidationFinding;
011
012import java.util.List;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * Provides processing hooks for a set of validation results.
018 *
019 * @since 2.0.0
020 */
021public abstract class AbstractValidationResultProcessor {
022
023  /**
024   * Handle the provided collection of validation results.
025   *
026   * @param result
027   *          the validation results
028   * @return {@code true} if the result is passing or {@code false} otherwise
029   */
030  public boolean handleResults(IValidationResult result) {
031    handleValidationFindings(result.getFindings());
032    return result.isPassing();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Handle the provided collection of validation findings.
037   *
038   * @param findings
039   *          the findings to process
040   */
041  public void handleValidationFindings(@NonNull List<? extends IValidationFinding> findings) {
042    for (IValidationFinding finding : findings) {
043      if (finding instanceof JsonValidationFinding) {
044        handleJsonValidationFinding((JsonValidationFinding) finding);
045      } else if (finding instanceof XmlValidationFinding) {
046        handleXmlValidationFinding((XmlValidationFinding) finding);
047      } else if (finding instanceof ConstraintValidationFinding) {
048        handleConstraintValidationFinding((ConstraintValidationFinding) finding);
049      } else {
050        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupported finding type: " + finding.getClass().getName());
051      }
052    }
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Process the JSON validation finding.
057   *
058   * @param finding
059   *          the validation finding to process
060   */
061  protected abstract void handleJsonValidationFinding(@NonNull JsonValidationFinding finding);
062
063  /**
064   * Process the XML validation finding.
065   *
066   * @param finding
067   *          the validation finding to process
068   */
069  protected abstract void handleXmlValidationFinding(@NonNull XmlValidationFinding finding);
070
071  /**
072   * Process the Metaschema module constraint validation finding.
073   *
074   * @param finding
075   *          the validation finding to process
076   */
077  protected abstract void handleConstraintValidationFinding(@NonNull ConstraintValidationFinding finding);
078}
